languages.text: "Теперь мы знаем о враге больше". {n}Она задумчиво проводит пальцем по клинку.{/n} "О том, как глубоко проник яд заговора. Но и Кровавая паутина плотно оплела твой корабль — Немезиту не скрыться".

"We now know much more about the enemy." {n}Kibellah ponderously runs her finger along the flat of the blade.{/n} "About just how deep the poison of conspiracy runs within the veins of your ship. But the Bloodspun Web has wrapped itself around its bays too tightly, and Nemesite can no longer hope to escape."
languages.original_text: "Теперь мы знаем о враге больше". {n}Она задумчиво проводит пальцем по клинку.{/n} "О том, как глубоко проник яд заговора. Но и Кровавая паутина плотно оплела твой корабль — Немезиту не скрыться".

traits.locale_text: "We now know more about the enemy." {n}She ponderously runs her finger along the blade.{/n} "About how deep the poison of the conspiracy runs in the veins of your ship. But the Bloodspun Web has wrapped itself around it tightly, and Nemesite cannot escape."

"We now know more about the enemy." {n}She ponderously runs her finger along the blade.{/n} "About how deep the poison of the conspiracy runs in the veins of your ship. But the Bloodspun Web has wrapped itself around it tightly, and Nemesite cannot escape."

"We now know much more about the enemy." {n}She ponderously runs her finger along the flat of the blade.{/n} "About just how deep the poison of conspiracy runs within the veins of your ship. But the Bloodspun Web has wrapped itself up too tightly, and Nemesite can no longer hope to escape."

"We now know much more about the enemy." {n}She ponderously runs her finger along the flat of the blade.{/n} "About just how deep the poison of conspiracy runs within the veins of your ship. But the Bloodspun Web has wrapped itself up too tightly, and Nemesite can no longer hope to escape."

"We now know much more about the enemy." {n}Kibellah ponderously runs her finger along the flat of the blade.{/n} "About just how deep the poison of conspiracy runs within the veins of your ship. But the Bloodspun Web has wrapped itself around its bays too tightly, and Nemesite can no longer hope to escape."

"We now know much more about the enemy." {n}Kibellah ponderously runs her finger along the flat of the blade.{/n} "About just how deep the poison of conspiracy runs within the veins of your ship. But the Bloodspun Web has wrapped itself around its bays too tightly, and Nemesite can no longer hope to escape."

languages.text: "Wir wissen jetzt viel mehr über den Feind." {n}Kibellah streicht mit dem Finger nachdenklich über die Klinge.{/n} "Etwa, wie tief das Gift der Verschwörung in die Adern Eures Schiffs eingedrungen ist. Aber das Blutgesponnene Netz hat sich zu eng um seine Buchten gelegt, und Nemesit kann nicht mehr darauf hoffen, zu entkommen."
languages.original_text: "We now know much more about the enemy." {n}Kibellah ponderously runs her finger along the flat of the blade.{/n} "About just how deep the poison of conspiracy runs within the veins of your ship. But the Bloodspun Web has wrapped itself around its bays too tightly, and Nemesite can no longer hope to escape."

traits.locale_text: "Wir wissen jetzt viel mehr über den Feind." {n}Kibellah streicht mit dem Finger nachdenklich über die Klinge.{/n} "Etwa, wie tief das Gift der Verschwörung in die Adern Eures Schiffs eingedrungen ist. Aber das Blutgesponnene Netz hat sich zu eng um seine Buchten gelegt, und Nemesit kann nicht mehr darauf hoffen, zu entkommen."

languages.text: «Ahora sabemos mucho más sobre el enemigo». {n}Kibellah pasa lentamente el dedo por la parte plana de la hoja de su daga.{/n} «Sabemos la medida en que el veneno de la conspiración fluye por las venas de su navío. Pero la Red Sanguinolenta también se ha extendido por todos sus compartimentos, y Nemesitio no tiene ninguna esperanza de huir».
languages.original_text: "We now know much more about the enemy." {n}Kibellah ponderously runs her finger along the flat of the blade.{/n} "About just how deep the poison of conspiracy runs within the veins of your ship. But the Bloodspun Web has wrapped itself around its bays too tightly, and Nemesite can no longer hope to escape."

traits.locale_text: «Ahora sabemos mucho más sobre el enemigo». {n}Kibellah pasa lentamente el dedo por la parte plana de la hoja de su daga.{/n} «Sabemos la medida en que el veneno de la conspiración fluye por las venas de su navío. Pero la Red Sanguinolenta también se ha extendido por todos sus compartimentos, y Nemesitio no tiene ninguna esperanza de huir».

languages.text: 「敵のことがよく分かったわ」{n}キベラは刃の平らな部分に指を走らせる。{/n}「陰謀の毒がどれほど深く、あなたの船の血管の中に流れているか分かったわ。だけどブラッドスパン・ウェブが標的のベイをギュッときつく包み込んで、ネメサイトは、もはや脱出をしたくても無理でしょう」
languages.original_text: "We now know much more about the enemy." {n}Kibellah ponderously runs her finger along the flat of the blade.{/n} "About just how deep the poison of conspiracy runs within the veins of your ship. But the Bloodspun Web has wrapped itself around its bays too tightly, and Nemesite can no longer hope to escape."

traits.locale_text: 「敵のことがよく分かったわ」{n}キベラは刃の平らな部分に指を走らせる。{/n}「陰謀の毒がどれほど深く、あなたの船の血管の中に流れているか分かったわ。だけどブラッドスパン・ウェブが標的のベイをギュッときつく包み込んで、ネメサイトは、もはや脱出をしたくても無理でしょう」

languages.text: “如今，我们对敌人有了更多了解。”{n}绮贝菈抚摸着匕首的刀身，仿佛思索一般。{/n}“我们已经明白阴谋的毒液在旗舰的血脉中侵染得有多深。不过，织血罗网早已紧紧缠绕在甲板上，涅墨斯特注定无法逃脱。”
languages.original_text: "We now know much more about the enemy." {n}Kibellah ponderously runs her finger along the flat of the blade.{/n} "About just how deep the poison of conspiracy runs within the veins of your ship. But the Bloodspun Web has wrapped itself around its bays too tightly, and Nemesite can no longer hope to escape."

traits.locale_text: “如今，我们对敌人有了更多了解。”{n}绮贝菈抚摸着匕首的刀身，仿佛思索一般。{/n}“我们已经明白阴谋的毒液在旗舰的血脉中侵染得有多深。不过，织血罗网早已紧紧缠绕在甲板上，涅墨斯特注定无法逃脱。”

languages.text: « Nous en savons désormais bien plus au sujet de notre ennemi, {n}fait Kibellah en longeant lentement du doigt le plat de sa lame.{/n} Le poison de la conspiration circule jusque dans les veines les plus profondes de votre vaisseau, mais la Toile de Sang a d'ores et déjà resserré ses filets sur ses compartiments, et Némésite n'a plus aucun espoir de nous échapper. »
languages.original_text: "We now know much more about the enemy." {n}Kibellah ponderously runs her finger along the flat of the blade.{/n} "About just how deep the poison of conspiracy runs within the veins of your ship. But the Bloodspun Web has wrapped itself around its bays too tightly, and Nemesite can no longer hope to escape."

traits.locale_text: « Nous en savons désormais bien plus au sujet de notre ennemi, {n}fait Kibellah en longeant lentement du doigt le plat de sa lame.{/n} Le poison de la conspiration circule jusque dans les veines les plus profondes de votre vaisseau, mais la Toile de Sang a d'ores et déjà resserré ses filets sur ses compartiments, et Némésite n'a plus aucun espoir de nous échapper. »

languages.text: "Artık düşman hakkında çok daha fazla şey biliyoruz." {n}Kibellah parmağını ağır ağır kılıcının düz yüzeyinde gezdiriyor.{/n} "Geminin damarlarında gezinen komplo zehrinin ne kadar derinlere işlediğini... Ancak Kanipi Ağı kendisini güvertelere sıkı sıkıya sardı ve Nemezit'in artık kaçış umudu kalmadı."
languages.original_text: "We now know much more about the enemy." {n}Kibellah ponderously runs her finger along the flat of the blade.{/n} "About just how deep the poison of conspiracy runs within the veins of your ship. But the Bloodspun Web has wrapped itself around its bays too tightly, and Nemesite can no longer hope to escape."
